text: The men's 4 x 400 metres relay event at the 1999 European Athletics U23 Championships was held in Göteborg, Sweden, at Ullevi on 1 August 1999. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; " width="35%" |- |bgcolor="gold"|Gold|| Sebastian Debnar-Daumler Thomas Goller Nils Schumann Stefan Holz ' |- |bgcolor="silver"|Silver|| Michał Węglarski Piotr Długosielski Mariusz Bizoń Piotr Haczek ' |- |bgcolor="CC9966"|Bronze|| Geoff Dearman Matthew Elias Peter Brend David Naismith ' |} ==Results== ===Final=== 1 August {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !!
